properties.LOCDESC: at the intersection with North Tryon Street
properties.COMMENT: LYNX Blue Line Extension construction. This is a NIGHTLY CLOSURE ONLY. Traffic signals are to be mounted on the bridge girders of the I-85 Connector Bridge. This operation will take three nights to complete. Each night, the left through lane will be closed in the northbound and southbound direction along with the left turn lanes on North Tryon Street. Traffic traveling East and West on I-85 Connector/Sandy Avenue will be forced to take a right onto northbound North Tryon Street, where they will be able to U-Turn at University City Boulevard or Tom Hunter Road. The intersection under the I-85 Connector Bridge will be completely closed to through traffic. All traffic will be forced into the right through lane on North Tryon Street along with a right turn only on I-85 Connector/Sandy Avenue at the intersection.
properties.CONTACT: Geoffrey Sloop at 704-336-3914 or Geoffrey.Sloop@charlottenc.gov.

properties.BLOCKNM: Arrowhead Drive (median and left turn lanes)

properties.LOCDESC: at the intersection of WT Harris Boulevard
properties.COMMENT: the LYNX Blue Line Extension construction. These are NIGHTLY CLOSURES ONLY. Both directions of North Tryon Street will be reduced to a single lane at the intersection of WT Harris Boulevard and will be allowed to continue along North Tryon Street or turn right onto WT Harris Boulevard. Motorists on WT Harris Boulevard approaching the intersection with North Tryon Street will be directed to turn right onto North Tryon Street. Motorists should follow the signed detour.
properties.CONTACT: Geoffrey Sloop at 704-336-3914 or Geoffrey.Sloop@charlottenc.gov.

Westbound traffic should use North Caldwell Street, East/West Sixth Street and West Fifth Street.

properties.BLOCKNM: University City Boulevard (median and left turn lanes)
properties.LOCDESC: at North Tryon Street
properties.COMMENT: LYNX Blue Line Extension construction. This is a NIGHTLY CLOSURE ONLY. Traffic signals are to be mounted on the bridge girders of the University City Boulevard Bridge. This operation is scheduled for three nights. Each night, the left through lane will be closed in the northbound and southbound direction along with the left turn lanes on North Tryon Street. Traffic traveling East and West on University City Boulevard will be directed to take a right onto North Tryon Street, where they will be able to U-Turn at Shopping Center Drive or I-85 Connector. The intersection under the University City Boulevard bridge will be completely closed to through traffic. All traffic will be directed into the right through lane on North Tryon Street and will be able to turn right onto University City Boulevard at the intersection.
properties.CONTACT: Geoffrey Sloop at 704-336-3914 or Geoffrey.Sloop@charlottenc.gov.

properties.LOCDESC: between Davidson Street and North Tryon Street
properties.COMMENT: finishing essential work on 36th Street related to the LYNX Blue Line Extension.  Remaining work includes final gas line tie-in work and pressure tests, grading and paving, curb and gutter and sidewalks. Due to the effects of Hurricane Florence, local utilities are dedicating resources to restore normalcy in eastern North Carolina, which necessitates in moving the expected opening date. The updated opening date of October 31, will continue to depend heavily upon weather conditions and availability of local utility crews. Safety is CATSâ€™ top priority, and 36th Street remains an active construction zone. Please obey all posted signs and stay out of construction areas.
properties.Creator: scastongiaCity
